AAF.caption: Cancel URL
AAF.doc: (optional) If set, Checkout displays a back button and customers will be directed to this URL if they decide to cancel payment and return to your website.
AAF.name: cancel_url

AAG.caption: Success URL
AAG.doc: The URL to which Stripe should send customers when payment or setup is complete.
AAG.name: success_url

AAH.caption: Currency
AAH.doc: Three-letter ISO currency code, in lowercase. Must be a supported currency. Check here: https://stripe.com/docs/currencies
AAH.name: currency

AAI.caption: Product name
AAI.doc: The productâ€™s name, meant to be displayable to the customer.
AAI.name: product_name

AAJ.caption: Quantity
AAJ.doc: The quantity of the line item being purchased.
AAJ.name: quantity

AAK.caption: Payment method
AAK.doc: A list of the types of payment methods (e.g., card) this Checkout Session can accept. Check here: https://stripe.com/docs/api/checkout/sessions/create#create_checkout_session-payment_method_types
AAK.name: payment_method

AAL.caption: Unity price amount
AAL.doc: The unit amount in cents to be charged, represented as a whole integer if possible. Check here: https://stripe.com/docs/currencies
AAL.name: unity_amount

AAN.caption: Mode
AAN.doc: The mode of the Checkout Session. Pass 'subscription' if the Checkout Session includes at least one recurring item. Possible value: payment, setup, subscription.
AAN.name: mode
